tool_description: The sky area and the hair area of the characters included in the input image can be processed by static rotation, and the micro-moving AVI format video can be obtained.
name: Image Micro Motion
title: Image Micro Motion

api_list.name: Image Micro Motion

required_parameters.name: operation
required_parameters.description:
The micro-motion state of the sky and hair.
- `1`: The sky moves slightly.
- `01`: The sky moves slightly.
- `10`: The hair moves slightly, the sky does not move.
- `11`: Both the hair and the sky move slightly.

required_parameters.name: image
required_parameters.description:
- **Image format**: `JPEG` `JPG` `PNG` `BMP`
- **Image size**: No more than 3 MB.
- **Image resolution**: Larger than 32x32px, smaller than 2000x2000px.
